content:
DataViewManager Class

Definition

Contains a default DataViewSettingCollection for each DataTable in a DataSet.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.Designer("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.VS.DataViewManagerDesigner, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")]
public class DataViewManager : System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent, System.Collections.IList, System.ComponentModel.IBindingList, System.ComponentModel.ITypedList
Inheritance
Object
System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent
DataViewManager

Constructors

DataViewManager()

Initializes a new instance of the DataViewManager class.

public DataViewManager ();

DataViewManager(DataSet)

Initializes a new instance of the DataViewManager class for the specified DataSet.

public DataViewManager (System.Data.DataSet dataSet);
dataSet
DataSet

The name of the DataSet to use.

Properties

DataSet

Gets or sets the DataSet to use with the DataViewManager.

public System.Data.DataSet DataSet { get; set; }
Value
DataSet

The DataSet to use.

DataViewSettingCollectionString

Gets or sets a value that is used for code persistence.

public string DataViewSettingCollectionString { get; set; }
Value
String

A value that is used for code persistence.

Remarks

A user should not call DataViewSettingCollectionString directly.

DataViewSettings

Gets the DataViewSettingCollection for each DataTable in the DataSet.

public System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection DataViewSettings { get; }
Value
DataViewSettingCollection

A DataViewSettingCollection for each DataTable.
